title: Question in Togoland: A Pictorial report
creator_credit: United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
brief_description: The life, homes, school, occupations, religion, music and arts of the people of Togoland. The country, which has been under U.N. trusteeship, is prepared for a plebiscite. Each voter learns how to designate either union with the Gold Coast or continued trusteeship. As a result of the plebiscite Togoland joined the Gold Coast in the new nation of Ghana.
